column1:
7unw3n,"2014-06-14T14:47:26.997Z","Practical and value for money. ","

I saw this set in stores behind the counter at a local monobrand
column2: shop. I bought it with little consideration as I thought a brick built LEGO box is just awesome

column1: The box is quite big for it'
column2: s size. It comes in several unnumbered bags.&nbsp

column1: One Minifigure. Generic painter with a brush and a bucket. This set also comes with one spare brush.
The build was a little tedious at first as the parts are very similar, only differing in length.
It is practical as it it a storage box but you can'
column2: t really put too many things inside. You may want to avoid storing sharp objects too.&nbsp

column1: The 2 storage boxes are stackable and they lie on too of each other separated by a smooth tile piece. I may buy one more set just to stack them up.
